statements: SELECT * FROM response_tracking WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT response_id, response_type, response_rating FROM response_tracking WHERE response_rating > 4;
SELECT customer_id, response_timestamp FROM response_tracking WHERE marketing_campaign_id = 100 ORDER BY response_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(response_id) AS total_responses FROM response_tracking GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT AVG(response_rating) AS avg_rating, MIN(response_rating) AS min_rating, MAX(response_rating) AS max_rating FROM response_tracking;
SELECT * FROM response_tracking WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY response_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT response_id, customer_id, response_timestamp FROM response_tracking WHERE response_type = 'Email' ORDER BY response_timestamp ASC;
SELECT customer_id, marketing_campaign_id, response_rating FROM response_tracking WHERE response_rating > 3 ORDER BY customer_id, marketing_campaign_id;
SELECT response_id, marketing_campaign_id, response_type FROM response_tracking WHERE marketing_campaign_id = 200 ORDER BY response_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT response_id, customer_id, response_timestamp, response_rating FROM response_tracking WHERE response_rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY response_rating DESC, response_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM response_tracking;
SELECT customer_id, response_type FROM response_tracking WHERE response_type = 'positive';
SELECT name, age FROM customer_profile WHERE gender = 'female';
SELECT response_id, marketing_channel FROM response_tracking ORDER BY response_id DESC;
SELECT email FROM customer_profile WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT response_id, customer_id, marketing_channel, response_timestamp, response_type FROM response_tracking ORDER BY response_timestamp DESC;
SELECT name, email, age, gender, customer_id FROM customer_profile WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, response_type FROM response_tracking WHERE marketing_channel = 'Email' AND response_type = 'Clicked';
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customer_profile ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT response_id, customer_id, response_type FROM response_tracking WHERE response_type IN ('Opened', 'Clicked') ORDER BY response_id;
SELECT * FROM response_tracking;
SELECT customer_id, response_timestamp, response_type FROM response_tracking ORDER BY response_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customer_details WHERE phone_number like '%123%';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number, response_type FROM response_tracking JOIN customer_details USING (customer_id) WHERE response_type = 'click';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_details;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, marketing_campaign_id, response_type FROM response_tracking WHERE response_timestamp >= '2022-02-01' ORDER BY response_timestamp DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_end_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY campaign_end_date;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_details WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM response_tracking;
SELECT customer_id, response_type FROM response_tracking WHERE response_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT income, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 AND location = 'New York';
SELECT campaign_id, total_responses, revenue FROM marketing_results WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT response_id, response_date, response_type FROM response_tracking ORDER BY response_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, income FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT result_id, campaign_id, conversion_rate, revenue FROM marketing_results WHERE total_responses > 100 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM response_tracking INNER JOIN customer_demographics ON response_tracking.customer_id = customer_demographics.customer_id WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM response_tracking;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_details ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_details WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT channel_name, clicks, revenue FROM marketing_channel_performance ORDER BY revenue DESC, clicks ASC;
SELECT * FROM response_tracking WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM customer_details WHERE region = 'North America';
SELECT campaign_name, marketing_channel, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_details WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' AND feedback_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT channel_name, clicks, conversions, revenue FROM marketing_channel_performance WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY conversions DESC LIMIT 5;
